page.title: 06GAMES - BLACKBURN 2
page.content:
SKIPPING SONGS I'm a little sandy girl dressed in blue These are the actions I must do Salute to the Captain Bow to the Queen And show my Knickers to the football team
Late last night or the night before, Twenty-four robbers came knocking on the door, As I went out to let them in, They hit me on the head with a rolling pin. BALL GAME - PEETO A Peeto is a pile of slates set up in a small circle. Team A throws a ball to try to knock it over. Team B returns the ball to A.If A knock it over they rebuild it,B try to stop them by hitting them with the ball
